00040 const char *Hyperspace::Protocol::command_strs[COMMAND_MAX] = {
00041   "keepalive",
00042   "handshake",
00043   "open",
00044   "stat",
00045   "cancel",
00046   "close",
00047   "poison",
00048   "mkdir",
00049   "attrset",
00050   "attrget",
00051   "attrdel",
00052   "attrlist",
00053   "attrexists",
00054   "exists",
00055   "delete",
00056   "readdir",
00057   "lock",
00058   "release",
00059   "checksequencer",
00060   "status"

00062 
00063 
00067 const char *Hyperspace::Protocol::command_text(uint64_t command) {
00068   if (command < 0 || command >= COMMAND_MAX)
00069     return "UNKNOWN";
00070   return command_strs[command];
00071 }
00072 
00076 CommBuf *
00077 Hyperspace::Protocol::create_client_keepalive_request(uint64_t session_id,
00078     uint64_t last_known_event, bool shutdown) {
00079   CommHeader header(COMMAND_KEEPALIVE);
00080   header.flags |= CommHeader::FLAGS_BIT_URGENT;
00081   CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(header, 17);
00082   cbuf->append_i64(session_id);
00083   cbuf->append_i64(last_known_event);
00084   cbuf->append_bool(shutdown);
00085   return cbuf;
00086 }

00092 CommBuf *
00093 Hyperspace::Protocol::create_server_keepalive_request(uint64_t session_id,
00094                                                       int error) {
00095   CommHeader header(COMMAND_KEEPALIVE);
00096   header.flags |= CommHeader::FLAGS_BIT_URGENT;
00097   CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(header, 16);
00098   cbuf->append_i64(session_id);
00099   cbuf->append_i32(error);
00100   cbuf->append_i32(0);
00101   return cbuf;
00102 }

00104 
00108 CommBuf *
00109 Hyperspace::Protocol::create_server_keepalive_request(SessionDataPtr &session_data) {
00110   ScopedLock lock(session_data->mutex);
00111   CommBuf *cbuf = 0;
00112   CommHeader header(COMMAND_KEEPALIVE);
00113   header.flags |= CommHeader::FLAGS_BIT_URGENT;
00114   uint32_t len = 16;
00115   list<Notification *>::iterator iter;
00116   String debug_mesg = (String) "Notification sent to session=" + session_data->id;
00117 
00118   for (iter = session_data->notifications.begin();
00119        iter != session_data->notifications.end(); ++iter) {
00120     len += 8;  // handle
00121     len += (*iter)->event_ptr->encoded_length();
00122     debug_mesg += (String) "(handle=" + (*iter)->handle + ", event id="
00123                  + (*iter)->event_ptr->get_id() + ", event_mask="
00124                  + (*iter)->event_ptr->get_mask() + ") ";
00125   }
00126 
00127   HT_DEBUG_OUT << debug_mesg << HT_END;
00128 
00129   cbuf = new CommBuf(header, len);
00130   cbuf->append_i64(session_data->id);
00131   cbuf->append_i32(Error::OK);
00132   cbuf->append_i32(session_data->notifications.size());
00133   for (iter = session_data->notifications.begin();
00134        iter != session_data->notifications.end(); ++iter) {
00135     cbuf->append_i64((*iter)->handle);
00136     (*iter)->event_ptr->encode(cbuf);
00137   }
00138 
00139   return cbuf;
00140 }

00142 
00146 CommBuf *Hyperspace::Protocol::create_handshake_request(uint64_t session_id) {
00147   CommHeader header(COMMAND_HANDSHAKE);
00148   header.flags |= CommHeader::FLAGS_BIT_URGENT;
00149   CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(header, 8);
00150   cbuf->append_i64(session_id);
00151   return cbuf;
00152 }

00154 
00158 CommBuf *
00159 Hyperspace::Protocol::create_open_request(const std::string &name,
00160     uint32_t flags, HandleCallbackPtr &callback,
00161     std::vector<Attribute> &init_attrs) {
00162   size_t len = 12 + encoded_length_vstr(name.size());
00163   CommHeader header(COMMAND_OPEN);
00164   for (size_t i=0; i<init_attrs.size(); i++)
00165     len += encoded_length_vstr(init_attrs[i].name)
00166            + encoded_length_vstr(init_attrs[i].value_len);
00167 
00168   CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(header, len);
00169 
00170   cbuf->append_i32(flags);
00171   if (callback)
00172     cbuf->append_i32(callback->get_event_mask());
00173   else
00174     cbuf->append_i32(0);
00175   cbuf->append_vstr(name);
00176 
00177   // append initial attributes
00178   cbuf->append_i32(init_attrs.size());
00179   for (size_t i=0; i<init_attrs.size(); i++) {
00180     cbuf->append_vstr(init_attrs[i].name);
00181     cbuf->append_vstr(init_attrs[i].value, init_attrs[i].value_len);
00182   }
00183 
00184   return cbuf;
00185 }
00186 
00187 
00188 CommBuf *Hyperspace::Protocol::create_close_request(uint64_t handle) {
00189   CommHeader header(COMMAND_CLOSE);
00190   header.gid = (uint32_t)((handle ^ (handle >> 32)) & 0x0FFFFFFFFLL);
00191   CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(header, 8);
00192   cbuf->append_i64(handle);
00193   return cbuf;
00194 }
00195 
00196 CommBuf *Hyperspace::Protocol::create_mkdir_request(const std::string &name) {
00197   CommHeader header(COMMAND_MKDIR);
00198   header.gid = filename_to_group(name);
00199   CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(header, encoded_length_vstr(name.size()));
00200   cbuf->append_vstr(name);
00201   return cbuf;
00202 }

00205 CommBuf *Hyperspace::Protocol::create_delete_request(const std::string &name) {
00206   CommHeader header(COMMAND_DELETE);
00207   header.gid = filename_to_group(name);
00208   CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(header, encoded_length_vstr(name.size()));
00209   cbuf->append_vstr(name);
00210   return cbuf;

00213 
00214 CommBuf *
00215 Hyperspace::Protocol::create_attr_set_request(uint64_t handle,
00216     const std::string &name, const void *value, size_t value_len) {
00217   CommHeader header(COMMAND_ATTRSET);
00218   header.gid = (uint32_t)((handle ^ (handle >> 32)) & 0x0FFFFFFFFLL);
00219   CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(header, 8 + encoded_length_vstr(name.size())
00220                               + encoded_length_vstr(value_len));
00221   cbuf->append_i64(handle);
00222   cbuf->append_vstr(name);
00223   cbuf->append_vstr(value, value_len);
00224   return cbuf;
00225 }

00280   CommHeader header(COMMAND_EXISTS);
00281   header.gid = filename_to_group(name);
00282   CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(header, encoded_length_vstr(name.size()));

00288 CommBuf *
00289 Hyperspace::Protocol::create_lock_request(uint64_t handle, uint32_t mode,
00290                                           bool try_lock) {
00291   CommHeader header(COMMAND_LOCK);
00292   header.gid = (uint32_t)((handle ^ (handle >> 32)) & 0x0FFFFFFFFLL);
00293   CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(header, 13);
00294   cbuf->append_i64(handle);
00295   cbuf->append_i32(mode);
00296   cbuf->append_byte(try_lock);
00297   return cbuf;
00298 }

00313 CommBuf *Hyperspace::Protocol::create_status_request() {
00314   CommHeader header(COMMAND_STATUS);
00315   header.flags |= CommHeader::FLAGS_BIT_URGENT;
00316   CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(header, 0);
00317   return cbuf;
00318 }
